headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double GTA$ & RP Bonuses and More
content:
As any established entrepreneur will tell you, Business Battles are a great way to resupply your various enterprises on the cheap - and stomp out a few rival CEOs along the way. This week only, the amount of all contested goods in Business Battles is being doubled to help keep your warehouses fully stocked and your profits on the rise.

Nightclub owners also see a 2X Popularity Boost for spreading the good word and completing Nightclub Management Missions.
